dialogue: Carol, if you have any suggestions on my report, let me know.
What kind of ridiculous tripe are you pushing?
I should burn it to ashes, but I won't...
Because I'd rather dance on your grave after people read this! Ha ha ha ha!
Crawl back into your hole, you fly-infested bucket of dead carp!!
Next time I'm just gonna say "Carol, make some copies."
The secretaries here have way too much power.
